version_description: We hold a lucky draw for promo code of WuKong i8.

1. Added support for RF Light and Socket
2. Redesigned RF Door Sensor user interface
3. Optimized for push notifications service of RF Gateway
4. Support to upgrade and delete slave devices of RF Gateway
5. General bug fixes and improvements

1. Support eight types of Wuan S2 series security protection devices such as Motion Detector/ Temperature & Humidity Sensor/Smart Water Leakage Detector/Smoke Detector/Door Sensor, etc.
2. Improve MacBee system operability
3. Brand new UI, optimize user experience.
4. Solve the problems from customers.

New Functions:
1. Support to create family and management;
2. Support family member management;
3. Support QR code to invite family member;
4. Support linkage function of devices in the family(need match up the latest firmware);
5. Support to record the latest log-in time of the family members.
New devices support:
1. Support Wuneng H2 Smart multipurpose thermostat;
2. Support Wuneng H2 Smart family multi-function thermostat.
Function Optimization:
1. Optimize the deivce to one-key configurattion of the AP Mode interface;
2. Optimize the UI of the brightness control for L5 smart light;
3. Optimize the history interface of RF devices.

1. Added support for S3 gateway
2. Added support for Mini Wukong
3. General bug fixes and improvements
General bug fixes and improvements

1. New UI of 24 Hours Temperature Curve
2. Add network diagnosis function
3. Optimize the function of one-key configuration
4. Optimize the interplay function

1. iOS10 bug fixes
2. General bug fixes and improvements

1. Brand new UI
2. Added new features: Tag and Shortcut Key
3. Added support for more devices like S5 Gateway, MacBee LED Strip Lights, etc.
4. Other function optimization and bug fixes

1. Added support for Custom Interplay
2. Added support to use Widgets to run a scene
3. Interplay user can reset password
4. Added support to view interplay history
5. Added support for more smart devices
6. General bug fixes and improvements
General bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes

1. Optimized the Scene Mode function
Now, it's easy to configure a scene mode. In addition, Smart Interplay now supports to trigger a scene mode.
2. Improvements and enchancements to several devices
Optimized several devices experience, such as Light, Mini WuKong, Switch Panel, HCHO Sensor, Smart Curtain and Gateway.
3. Optimized the History function
Added support to clear history cache and set cache time.
4. General improvements and bug fixes

1. Added support for new devices: Smart all-in-one Sensor, T10 Scene Panel, PIR Door Sensor.
2. Optimized the Interplay function: you can order the action lists now.
3. Optimized the function of Smart Plug.
4. Fixed iOS 11 bug.
5. General bug fixes and improvements.

1. new functionality: S3 gateway supports cloud backup; multiple reversion functions; APP opinion feedback, comment and point praise
2. related modifications: Mini Wukong hardware adjustment, historical record adjustment, linkage increase rule number limit
3. General bug fixes and improvements.

General bug fixes and improvements.
Happy Spring Festival!

1. Added support for new devices: Smart Switch, Scene Panel, 4G Gateway, Smart Switch Box, Music Player.
2. Optimized the function of the Wuneng S8 Socket, Temperature & Humidity Sensor.
3. Other function improvements
4. General bug fixes and improvements.

1.Added compatibility for  iOS 12
2.Added support for new device: Virtual Light Control Remote
3.Optimized some functions and user experience
4.General bug fixes and improvements.

1. Added support for a new type of device: Smart Door Lock.
2. General bug fixes.
Fixed an issue where slave devices cannot update firmware.
General bug fixes and improvements.

1. Added support for new devices: S10 Gateway, Bathroom Heater Controller, H4 Thermostat, Smart Switch Panel.
2. Optimized the function of the Gateway, Smart Environment Sensor and Music Player.
3. Optimized our code and promoted user experience.
4. General bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed some bugs

1. Added support for several new devices.
2. Optimized the function of the Smart Light and Curtain device.
3. Optimized the Interplay function.
4. General bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed iOS 13 bug.

2. Added support for several new devices
3. Optimized the function of Gateway, Wukong mini and Smart Switch Panel
4. General bug fixes and improvements
